divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving to store on the nite of solar flares,that is reported by my local news station on Feburary of 2012.While leaving my place of residence at the time of 6:55pm eastern time.I have witnessed while slowing not coming to a complete stop at the corner of andrews blvd & nickerson traffic light a shining light coming through the tree tops.What looks alot like a plane landing lights but this was alot different.Theres was no sound and the motion it was moving, gliding or floating.The lights came down directly behind traffic lights then abruptly turn away crossing over andrews blvd.Over houses it went in the direction of one school from the direction it came another John Cary elementary.In my visual I seen the three lights come to a stop over a house.The objects passed more like 30ft in front of me out in the jeep.The objects formed a lined verticle one over top of other.Then a forth object appeared lined up with middle light a spiral of fire it glowed orange and a red light.Moving towards buckroe beach the objects started to move.So I followed crossing lanes upon nickerson blvd and of course the lite was green.While driving I lose sight of objects.But I press on stopping at a local store near the beach to buy a drink.After leaving store I head over to a turn around at the beach boardwalk upon arrival I call my brother to tell him what I seen.He sound in a little disbelief asking who else seen it.Who knows there were drivers all out that nite but while on the phone a flash happen like something from a old camera flash bulb from my right.It got my attention then another from my left so I say to my brother I seen a flash he comment mabe its a cops car around just as soon as he say that a giant flash from behind lit up in my jeep.Creeping me out enough to leave but pressing my gas pedal to floor its not picking up speed.I was a little creeped out by it but I got up the way.Losing signal to my call bro dont try calling me back but he can say get out of before getting abdupted funny dude.Long story short I got home walking up stairs in house hall way lights on something like blacksmoke vibrating off my face and body reaching out to touch but enough for now.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: While making a well not a complete stop at traffic light.I saw a UFO coming down shining thru tree tops on the night of solar flares in feburary 2012
